SA15bsa061_u:11: bāhyārthavādinaḥ kila vijñānamātratāyāṃ santānāntarasattā nopapadyata iti codayanti /
SA15bsa061_u:15: na teṣāṃ prāṇyantarapratipattaye pratyakṣapramāṇamasti; jñānamātrasya svāṃśamātrālambanatvāt,
SA15bsa061_u:20: nāpyāgamaḥ sambhavati, tasya rūpaskandhāntarbhāvāt, etasya ca pratikṣepāt /
SA15bsa061_u:21: tathāhi, āgamaḥ śabdātmako vā bhaved vyañjanasvabhāvo vā /
SA15bsa061_u:25: tathā sati, āgamādapi prāṇyantaraṃ pratipattuṃ na śakyata iti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:31: sa tu pratipattṛsantāne sannapyupacāratastathāgatasya vā kapilasya vā kaṇādasya vā karturvacanamiti vyapadiśyate /
SA15bsa061_u:32: evaṃ sarve 'pi bauddhā vācakaṃ śabdasāmānyākāraṃ jñānaṃ manyante; na cāsti śabdaviśeṣaḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:35: taccānumānaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇorabhāve 'pi yathā pravartate yaddarśayitumāha - buddhipūrvāmityādi /
SA15bsa061_u:39: sā cātra gamanāgamanasaṃlāpecchārūpā parigṛhyate, kriyāhetutvāt tasyāḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:40: sāsti pūrvaṃ yasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sā buddhipūrvā /
SA15bsa061_u:41: pūrveti śabdenātra kāraṇasya nirdeśaḥ, kāraṇasya pūrvavartitvāt /
SA15bsa061_u:42: yadi nāma bāhyārthavādibhiḥ svasantāne tāṃ buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāmupalabhya paścātparasantāne grahād vivakṣitarūpā dhīḥ vijñānaṃ gamyate,
SA15bsa061_u:48: ātmani cittaspandanapūrvau kriyābhilāpau dṛṣṭvānyatra tayordarśanād yadi spandanamanumīyeta,
SA15bsa061_u:55: tenāyamartho bhavati - ātmani jigamiṣāvivakṣāpūrvayoḥ kriyābhilāpayordarśanāt parasantāne 'pi tau kriyābhilāpau copalabhya cittaspandanamanumīyata iti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:58: atra spandanetyaviśeṣeṇoktam, tathāpi pūrvaṃ cittaspandanamiti prakṛtenābhisambandhanīyam /
SA15bsa061_u:60: nanu bāhyārthavāde tu paracittanimittake kāyavākkarmaṇī liṅgatvena svīkriyete,
SA15bsa061_u:61: antarjñeyavāde tayorabhāvāt kathaṃ sāmyamiti cet? evamāha -
SA15bsa061_u:62: tacca kāyavāgvijñaptipratibhāsi jñānaṃ jñānāntaraspandanaviśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatītyevaṃ na matam /
SA15bsa061_u:64: antarjñeyavādināpi kāyavāgvijñāptipratibhāsi kāyavāgvijñaptakārakaṃ jñānaṃ paracittasya spandanaviśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatīti na manyate /
SA15bsa061_u:67: viśeṣeti vacanena cikīrṣā, vivakṣā ca parigṛhyete // 3 //
SA15bsa061_u:69: atha parajñānasya kriyāyā anupalambhāt paradhīranumātuṃ na yujyata iti cet? na; tulyatvāt /
SA15bsa061_u:71: na bhavatā kadāpi parajñānapūrvake kriyāvāgākārake jñāne upalabhyete /
SA15bsa061_u:75: yato hi, eṣa upālambho bhavatāmapi tulyaḥ // 4 //
SA15bsa061_u:77: paro 'pi parajñānapūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati /
SA15bsa061_u:80: bāhyārthavādyapi paracittaspandanapūrvakau tau kriyābhilāpau na kadāpi paśyati /
SA15bsa061_u:83: na hi samarthanāya prasiddhasambandho 'nvekṣaṇīyaḥ, api tu doṣasāmyādeva paro nigṛhītaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:86: ātmanaścittasya paravartinornimittatvānupapatteḥ paracittaṃ jñāyata it cet?
SA15bsa061_u:89: yasmādātmanaścittaṃ santānāntaravartinoḥ kriyābhilāpayoḥ kāraṇatvena na yujyate,
SA15bsa061_u:103: ahaṃ gacchāmi, ahaṃ vadāmīti ye svacittanimittake kāravākkarmaṇī te svasantāne upalabhyete /
SA15bsa061_u:106: bhavatvātmacittanimittakayoḥ svasantāne darśanam / tena kim? tasmādāha -
SA15bsa061_u:109: paravartikriyābhilāpāvapi yadyātmacittaśrayiṇau syātām, tadā tāvapi ātmani dṛśyeyātām // 9 //
SA15bsa061_u:112: ayaṃ gacchati, ayaṃ vadatītyevaṃ vicchinnadeśe dṛśyete /
SA15bsa061_u:117: antarjñeyavāde 'pi svasantāne vicchinnadeśapratibhāsinoḥ kriyābhilāpapratibhāsijñānayoḥ samutthāpakacittasya pratisaṃvedanaṃ na bhavati // 11 //
SA15bsa061_u:119: svacittaspandananimittake vijñāptipratibhāsinī jñāne cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahirmukhapratibhāsinī anyanimittāditpadyete /
SA15bsa061_u:121: ye svacittaspandananimittake kriyāvākpratibhāsinī jñāne te cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī 'ahaṃ gacchami,
SA15bsa061_u:123: parasantānavartinī tu 'ayaṃ gacchami, ayaṃ vadati' iti bahirmukhapratibhāsinī pratīyete /
SA15bsa061_u:125: svacittasya spandanaṃ svacittaspandanam, tannimittaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ // 12 //
SA15bsa061_u:129: ye bahirmukhapratibhāsinī jñāne te 'nimitte iti kinneṣyete? na spandananimittale iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:133: bhavatu kila nimittāmātrasya pratiṣedhaḥ tathāpi prakaraṇavaśāt spandanamātrasya pratiṣedho draṣṭavyaḥ // 13 //
SA15bsa061_u:137: yadi vicchinnapratibhāsinī kriyāvāgākārake jñāne spandanābhāve 'pi vinā kiṃcana kriyāvāgākāraṃ bhavet,
SA15bsa061_u:138: tadā sarvāṇyapi kriyāvāgākārakāṇi jñānāni spandanena vinā bhaveyuḥ;
SA15bsa061_u:143: ata āha - vicchinnāvicchinnapratibhāsakṛto bhedo na jñānayoḥ spandanatvanimittabhedavibhāgakṛt /
SA15bsa061_u:147: sa tu yato na jñānayoḥ spandanatvanimittasya bhedakaḥ;
SA15bsa061_u:151: atha nimittatvabhedābhāve ko doṣaḥ syāt? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:154: yato hyatra bhinnabhūtayoḥ jñānayoḥ kriyāvākpratibhāsatve na kaścid viśeṣo 'sti /
SA15bsa061_u:158: tathā sati, avicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsabheda eva spandanapūrvako na bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:162: tasmād yo 'vicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ kriyāvākpratibhāsaḥ sa kevalaṃ spandananimittako na bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:167: tenātrāyaṃ samudāyārthaḥ - vicchinnāvicchinnabhedamanapekṣya sāmānyena kriyābhilāpayoḥ pratibhāsamātraṃ spandananimittakam /
SA15bsa061_u:168: yato hi kaścid vicchinno 'pi pratibhāsa spandanapūrvako dṛśyate,
SA15bsa061_u:175: śaropalaprakṣepaṇāni yantraṃ ca nirmāṇaṃ ca parapracālanaṃ cetivigrahaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:182: bhavatu eteṣāṃ kriyāviśeṣāṇāṃ vicchinnaḥ pratibhāsaḥ, tathāpi spandanapūrvakatvam /
SA15bsa061_u:183: etaduktaṃ bhavati - vicchinnapratibhāso 'spandanapūrvakatvena na vyāpta iti // 18 //
SA15bsa061_u:190: etaduktaṃ bhavati - bhavantu ete svadehasambaddhāḥ, tathāpi nātmaspandanapūrvakā iti // 19 //
SA15bsa061_u:192: tena hyatra kriyāviśeṣamātreṇa spandanasya pratītiriti yujyate /
SA15bsa061_u:202: tasmādāha - tatra yadi kasyacidapūrvakatvam, na ko 'pi tatpūrvaka syāt; viśeṣābhāvāt /
SA15bsa061_u:211: yato hi yadi kasyacidatatpūrvakatvaṃ bhavet sarvasyātatpūrvakatvaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa061_u:215: na hyevaṃ śakyate 'numātum - ṃrāgād vadatīti vā dveṣādvā mohādvā /
SA15bsa061_u:217: na tu spandanaviśeṣam; viśeṣe liṅgasya vyabhiucāraditi // 22 //
SA15bsa061_u:223: ātmani spandanānupalambhāt sāmarthyādanyatra spandanamanumīyata iti cet /
SA15bsa061_u:232: tadavaśyamabhyupagantavyamiti darśayitumāha - tenāvaśyaṃ tau spandananimittakatvāttadabhāve na bhavata iti vaktavyam /
SA15bsa061_u:234: tathāvipratipannena bāhyārthavādināvaśyamiyamupapattirvaktavyā - tayoḥ kriyābhilāpayoḥ spandanajanyarūpatvāt spandanābhāve tau na bhavata iti // 25 //
SA15bsa061_u:236: paro 'pi tayoḥ pratibhāsau tathaiva vadet / ataḥ nānayoḥ parasparaṃ bhedaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:238: antarjñeyavādyapi tathaiva vadet - vicchinnapratibhāsijñāne spandanajanyarūpatvāttadabhāve na bhavata iti /
SA15bsa061_u:239: tathā sati nānayoḥ bāhyārthavādāntarjñeyavādayoḥ parasparaṃ bhedo 'sti /
SA15bsa061_u:240: etaduktaṃ bhavati - yathā bāhyārthavādī parasambaddhakriyābhilāpau spandanajanyarūpatvāt tadabhāve na bhavata iti vadati,
SA15bsa061_u:241: tathaivāntarjñeyavādyapi bāhirmukhapratibhāsijñāne spandanajanyatvāt tadabhāve na bhavata iti vadet /
SA15bsa061_u:244: yadi tatra pratibhāsinyoḥ spandananimittakatvamucyate, svapnāvasthāyāmapi kinnocyate?
SA15bsa061_u:246: kriyābhilāpapratibhāsijñānayoḥ spandananimittakatvaṃ vadan yogācāraḥ svapnāvasthāyāmapi tayoḥ spandananimittakatvaṃ kinna vadatīti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā // 27 //
SA15bsa061_u:248: sarvaṃ samānam / paro 'pi svapnopalabdhaparakriyāvācau spandananimittike iti kinna vadati?
SA15bsa061_u:251: kiṃ tarhi? etadapi pūrveṇa saha sarvaṃ samānamiti śeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:253: bāhyārthavādyapi svapnāvasthāyāṃ yau parasambaddhau kriyābhilāpāvupalabhyete tau paracittanimittakāviti kinna vadati // 28 //
SA15bsa061_u:265: atha middhenopahatatvāt puruṣasyārthaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyata iti cet /
SA15bsa061_u:273: antarjñeyavādīnāṃ mate 'pitasmāt middhena bhrāntatvādeva parādhipatyarahite kriyābhilāpākāreke jñāne jāyete itīṣṭam // 32 //
SA15bsa061_u:274: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikena saha samānatāṃ pratipādya vaibhāṣikamatāśaṅkyāha -
SA15bsa061_u:275: atha svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāttadopalabhyamānānyapi santānāntarāṇyeva iti cet /
SA15bsa061_u:277: svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāt svapnāvasthāyāṃ yeṣāṃ prāṇināmupalabdhirbhavati te ca sattvāḥ santyeva satyataḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:281: tadā parābhimataṃ tasya parādhipatyaṃ na ko 'pi nivārayet /
SA15bsa061_u:283: yaḥ yuktyā āgamācca rahitaḥ sa yuktyāgamarahitaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:285: yadi vaibhāṣikāḥ yogācārān prativigrahītuṃ tamabhyupagaccheyuḥ, anena ca mama parājaya iti /
SA15bsa061_u:287: tadā yogācārabhimataṃ sattvasya tathāvidhaparadhipatyamapi na kaścinnivārayet /
SA15bsa061_u:290: teṣāmevādhipatyādasmākaṃ vijñaptipratibhāsāḥ jāyanta iti vaktavyaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa061_u:291: tena hi yad viṣamatvaṃ yuktyāgamarahitatvaṃ tadevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA15bsa061_u:294: tathā sati svapnadṛṣṭarūpasya sapratighatvaṃ sanidarśanatvañca bhavet /
SA15bsa061_u:295: tena hi hastyādīnāṃ gavākṣādiṣu praveśo nopapadyeta, taddeśasthairapi dṛśyo bhavet /
SA15bsa061_u:296: atha sanidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ ca neṣyate, tadā rūpameva tanna bhavet /
SA15bsa061_u:298: yadātmānaṃ bahirgataṃ prekṣate,tadā santānasya dvitvamapi prasajyeta /
SA15bsa061_u:301: svapnadṛṣṭarūpasya sadbhāvābhyupagame tvevemādayo bahavo doṣā prasajyante // 34 //
SA15bsa061_u:302: evaṃ tāvat samānatāṃ prasādhya svapakṣe yuktyāgamarahitatvaṃ parihartumāha -
SA15bsa061_u:303: etat keṣāñcinmata eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni jñānāni santānāntarāyattāni /
SA15bsa061_u:307: keṣāzncid yogācārāṇāṃ mata eva jāgradavasthāvat svapne 'pi tathāvidhānī kriyāvāgākārajñānāni parasantānā yattāni bhavanti /
SA15bsa061_u:316: devādyadhiṣṭhānataḥ supriyavaṇijo vijñaptipratibhāsīni jñānāni jāyante ādītyanena yogipiśācādīnāmadhiṣṭhānāni saṃgṛhītāni // 37 //
SA15bsa061_u:324: muhurbhavataiva paryanuyujyate - kasmāt bhavatparikalpitayā tayā kriyayā paracittaṃ jñāyate // 39 //
SA15bsa061_u:327: cittasya kāryatvāditi / yasmāccittasya kāryam, tasmāt sā gamikā // 40 //
SA15bsa061_u:329: tasya kāryatvaṃ tu cittantare 'pi tulyamiti kathanna jñāyate?
SA15bsa061_u:330: tasya kāryatvamityādi kriyā cittasya kāryatvāccittasya gamiketi cet?
SA15bsa061_u:331: cittasya tatkāryatvaṃ tu kriyāpratibhāsijñāne 'pi tulyatvāttena kriyāpratibhāsenāpi kasmāt paracittaṃ na jñāyate // 41 //
SA15bsa061_u:337: kiñceyaṃ kriyā sattāmātrāt paracittamavabodhayed ohosvit jñānāt?
SA15bsa061_u:338: yadi tāvad sattāmātrāditi, tadā kriyāmanupalabhyamānenāpi prāṇinā paracitta pratipadyeta // 42 //
SA15bsa061_u:342: na hi liṅgaṃ sattāmātrāt gamakaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa061_u:346: tadā tatra kimanayā paramparayā - paracittāt kriyā, kriyātaḥ jñānam, jñānāttasya pratipattiriti /
SA15bsa061_u:347: tadā tatretyādi syānmatam - liṅga jñānamapekṣya gamakamiti /
SA15bsa061_u:348: hanta, tarhi na kiñcit prayojanamanayā paramparayā /
SA15bsa061_u:350: paramparā tu paracittāt kriyā utpadyate, kriyātaḥ jñānam, jñānāttasya pratipattiriti // 44 //
SA15bsa061_u:356: kriyetyapi yujyeta, kriyāpratibhāsijñānamityapi yujyeta / kaścātra viśeṣaḥ? tasmād āha -
SA15bsa061_u:363: spandanamātrasāmānyāṃ kriyābhilāpajñānasāmānyasya kāraṇatvāt kāryeṇa lāraṇasya gatiḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:368: ata eva uktam - kāryeṇa karaṇasya gati iti /
SA15bsa061_u:371: evaṃ sāmānyena kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ nirdiśya kāryasya bhedamupadarśayitumāha -
SA15bsa061_u:372: tatra ātmaspandananimittakasyāntarmukhavṛttiḥ, anyasyānyathā / prāyeṇādhikṛtya asau bhedaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:378: tatra syānmatam - bhavatu jāgradavasthāyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ, svapnāvasthāyāṃ tu tatkathamiti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:380: etayoḥ saḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svāpādyavasthāyāmitarasyāmapi ca samānaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:384: nanu svapne samutthāpakaspandanameva nāsti / tatkathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya samānateti / tasmādāha -
SA15bsa061_u:385: bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayāt paraspandanādinimittodbhūtavijñānavāsanaiva kadācitparābhogādeḥ vyavahitādapi vṛttiṃ labhate,
SA15bsa061_u:389: yathāsvamityanena svapnasya middhaviśeṣaḥ, narakādeḥ karmavipākāvasthā ca parogṛhyate /
SA15bsa061_u:395: ādītyanena mukhakāntiraktimādīnāṃ janakacittasya paroigrahaḥ paraspandanādi ca nimittaṃ ceti samāsaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:397: yasya kriyādipratibhāsivijñānasya tadanyasmāt spandanādinimittādudbhavituṃ śīlamasti tat paraspandādinimittodbhūtavijñānam /
SA15bsa061_u:399: parābhogaḥ paramanaskāraḥ ādītyanena tatkālabhāvināṃ tadanyapratyayānāṃ parigrahaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:403: evamuktaṃ bhavati - bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ pratyayaviśeṣasya upāśrayāt paraspandanādinimittadudbhūtavijñānavāsanā kadācit vyavahitād parābhogādapi vṛttiṃ labhate /
SA15bsa061_u:405: evaṃ svapnāvasthāyāmapi kriyāpratibhāsijñānānāṃ spandananimittakatvaṃ sādhayitvā upasaṃhartum āha -
SA15bsa061_u:408: tasmāt svāpajāgradubhayorapyavasthayoḥ kriyāpratibhāsāt cittaspandanamanumīyata eveti sthitam /
SA15bsa061_u:411: kriyātaḥ spandanapratipattau svāpa itarasmiñca syāt pratipattiratha vā naiva kadācana /
SA15bsa061_u:416: tadā tat jāgradavasthāyāmapi yujyeta na kadāciyt kriyātaḥ spandanasya pratipattirbhavediti vākyaśeṣaḥ // 52 //
SA15bsa061_u:421: yasyābhāve 'pi yadutpadyate, na tattasya gamakaṃ yuktaṃ // 53 //
SA15bsa061_u:428: ālambanaṃ tu spandanābhāve 'pyutpadyate, na tu kriyā /
SA15bsa061_u:437: yasya vyapadeśasya santi sarve prakārāḥ sa sarvaprakāravyapadeśaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:441: evamuktaṃ bhavati - jāgradavasthāvat svapnāvasthāyāmapi dṛśyākārādayaḥ sarve santi /
SA15bsa061_u:452: tadā mahābhramarājñyā avidyāyāḥ sadbhāvāt tadvaśācca sarvāṇi jñānānyarthaśūnyāni jāyanta iti manyeran // 57 //
SA15bsa061_u:454: tathā satyarthāntaravādahānyā ete 'nekāśakyanigūhanāvatārāḥ mahākṛcchrā uttareṇaikena nihatā bhavanti /
SA15bsa061_u:459: yasmārthāntaravādasya aneke avatārāḥ doṣāḥ parihāralakṣaṇenāśakyanigūhanāḥ santyamī anekāśakyanigūhanāvatārāḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:466: evaṃ santānāntarasiddhiṃ parisamāpyāvaśiṣṭān durupālambhān parihartukāmaḥ paramatamāśaṅkitum āha -
SA15bsa061_u:467: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ svamutthāpakacittasyānumānamiti nyāyyam /
SA15bsa061_u:475: ye ca śrotṛsantānasambaddhavijñaptipratibhāsijñāne spandanasya gamake iti bhavadbhiriṣṭe,
SA15bsa061_u:483: nocyate paracittasamitthitavijñaptirūpatvāt tatra pratibhāsijñānena samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti /
SA15bsa061_u:488: sā yasya pratibhāsino jñānasya rūpaṃ svabhāvo 'sti tattathā /
SA15bsa061_u:492: evamuktaṃ bhavati - yasmāt tatra pratibhāsi jñānaṃ paracittasamutthitavijñaptirūpam,
SA15bsa061_u:493: tasmāt samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti vayamapi nābhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:494: yadi nābhyupagamyate, kiṃ tarhi abhyupagamyata iti cet? āha - kiṃ tarhi? tasya kāryatvād iti /
SA15bsa061_u:495: yasmād vijñaptipratibhāsijñānaṃ paracittasya kāryam, tasmāt paracittaṃ gamyate /
SA15bsa061_u:497: yadi śrotṛsantānājjāte kriyāvāgākārake jñāne vijñaptitvena neṣyete,
SA15bsa061_u:501: samutthāpakacittasantānājjāte ye kriyāvāgākārake jñāne te vijñaptitvena vyapadiśyete /
SA15bsa061_u:502: evamuktaṃ bhavati - vaktureva ye gamanābhilāpane kriyāvāgākārake jñāne te vijñaptīti ucyete // 61 //
SA15bsa061_u:503: samutthāpakacittaṃ svaparasantānagatayoḥ kriyāvāgākārakajñāneyoryathā kāraṇabhāvo bhavati taddarśayitumāha -
SA15bsa061_u:510: svamate tu upādānakāraṇamālayavijñānamiṣyate, na tu vivakṣācittam // 62 //
SA15bsa061_u:516: vijñapteryadupādānakāraṇaṃ tena te santānāntarasambaddhakriyāvāgākārake jñāne janite /
SA15bsa061_u:517: tajjanisambandhena tena hetunā upacārād vijñaptīti vyapadiśyete // 63 //
SA15bsa061_u:519: na hi śrotā vaktṛsantānājjāte kriyāvākpratibhāsijñāne upalabhate /
SA15bsa061_u:520: tathā hi, vaktā śrotā cobhāvapi svasvapratibhāsamanu bhavataḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:521: tatkathaṃ te 'nālambane vijñaptitvena svasamutthāpakasya gamake iti / tasmādāha -
SA15bsa061_u:544: tathā hi, vaktā caivaṃ cintayati - yanmayā kathitaṃ tat śrotrā jñātam /
SA15bsa061_u:545: śrotāpyevaṃ cintayati - yadanena kathitaṃ tanmayā pratītam /
SA15bsa061_u:547: ekahetunā samutthāpakena ye sambhūte te ekahetusambhūte /
SA15bsa061_u:550: tathāpi tayoḥ ya ekahetusambhūte kriyāvāgākārakajñāne ta ekārthapratītiniyamād vijñaptitvena vyapadiśyete /
SA15bsa061_u:553: ekaḥ taimirikaḥ dvitīyaṃ taimirikaṃ 'paśya' iti "aparaṃ candraṃ' darśayati /
SA15bsa061_u:562: aviṣayatve tu kathaṃ jñānena paracittasattā pratīyate? tatsvarūpājñāne
SA15bsa061_u:567: tasmājjātaṃ kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yat paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkaroti āhosvinneti dvidhā parīkṣā /
SA15bsa061_u:569: yadi nāma viṣayīkaroti, tadā tasya viṣayaḥ pṛthak syāt /
SA15bsa061_u:571: atha na viṣayīkaroti, tadā kathaṃ paracittasattā jñāyate?
SA15bsa061_u:575: sa tu tadabhāve na bhavatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ // 65 //
SA15bsa061_u:580: kriyāvāgbhyāṃ paracittapratipattimatāmapi tatsvarūpaviṣayīkaraṇe svacittajñānavattadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa061_u:581: tadajñāne tu tena tatsvarūpasya grahaṇaṃ katham /
SA15bsa061_u:583: kiñca yadā bāhyārthāvādibhiḥ kriyāvāgbhyāṃ liṅgābhyāṃ paracittaṃ jñāyate,
SA15bsa061_u:584: tadā tasya paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna?
SA15bsa061_u:585: yadi nāma viṣayīkriyate, tadā paracittasyākāro 'pi jñāyeta /
SA15bsa061_u:586: atha na viṣayīkriyate, tadā tena jñānena pratipattrā vā kathaṃ jñāyeta? // 67 //
SA15bsa061_u:588: atha liṅgāt sāmānyādhigateḥ nākārasya pratītiriti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:589: atha liṅgāt sāmānyādhigate ityādi / yasmālliṅgaṃ sāmānyena vyāptam, na tu viśeṣeṇa /
SA15bsa061_u:590: tasmātsāmānyameva jñāyate, na viśeṣa iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā // 68 //
SA15bsa061_u:594: kiñca tatsāmānyaṃ paracittameva vā, anyadvā, āhosvidavācyamiti tridhā parīkṣā // 69 //
SA15bsa061_u:596: anyatvāvācyatvayorekatve tvanena tatsāmānyameva gṛhyeta, na paracittam /
SA15bsa061_u:600: tasmāt kathamanena jñānena tat paracittaṃ jñāyate? avācyatvapakṣe 'pi eṣa eva nayaḥ // 70 //
SA15bsa061_u:602: nāpi sāmānyaṃ paracittameva / tathā sati tadākārastāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta ityuktam /
SA15bsa061_u:607: tadā paracittākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta ityuktaṃ prāk // 71 //
SA15bsa061_u:609: na hyeṣā anumānaprakriyā / na hyeṣā anumānaprakriyeti // 72 //
SA15bsa061_u:616: kathanna svalakṣaṇasya grāhakatveneṣyate cet? āha - pratibhāsāviśiṣṭatvādeḥ prasaṅgāditi /
SA15bsa061_u:623: tena bhavatu prāmāṇyamiti cet? naiṣa nyāyaḥ // 74 //
SA15bsa061_u:624: yadi pramāṇasya svalakṣaṇagrahaṇanibandhanatvaṃ neṣyate, tatkathamasya pramāṇyamiti cedāha -
SA15bsa061_u:627: na hyanumānena viṣayasvarūpasya grahaṇam, apitu abhipretārthāvisaṃvādakatvāt prāmāṇyamiṣyate /
SA15bsa061_u:628: kvacit granthe 'tena nāsya prāmāṇyam' iti pāṭhaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:629: tatra tvevaṃ yojanīyam - yadā pratibhāsādayo 'bhinnāḥ, tadā pramāṇameva na taditi /
SA15bsa061_u:630: yadi anumānena svalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhyeta, tarhi pramāṇameva neṣyate /
SA15bsa061_u:638: na hi dhūmādiliṅgājjātamanumānaṃ vahnyādeḥ svarūpasya grāhakatveneṣyate /
SA15bsa061_u:640: yadyanumānaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ gṛhṇīyāt, tadā pratyakṣeṇa tulyatvaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa061_u:643: syādetat - paracittānumāne tasyāvisaṃvāditvameva nāsti / ata āha -
SA15bsa061_u:647: tatpravartanadvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttau tadādhipatyādāgatārthasya prāpteḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:650: taddvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya yadi punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttimabhilāṣavyāyāmānyatrānyatragamanādikāṃ kuryāt,
SA15bsa061_u:654: atha vā punaḥ punarvyahāre pravartanamiti saṃlāpādanu gṛhapraveśaḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:660: kiṃ punaruttaravyahārasādhanāya prāmāṇyamiṣyata iti cet? ata āha -
SA15bsa061_u:666: yo lokaḥ tanmātraphalaṃ cintayati saḥ tanmātraphalacintakaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:674: tathā pratibhāsituṃ śīlaṃ yasya jñānasya tattathā /
SA15bsa061_u:680: evamuktaṃ bhavati - yadā puruṣasya vahnyupalabdheranu dāhādipratibhāsijñānānubhavodayaḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:683: kintu kathaṃ tanmātreṇa pūrvajñānasya prāmāṇyamiti cet? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:690: na tanmātreṇa pūrvajñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ yujyate, tadānīṃ sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ bhrāntatvāt /
SA15bsa061_u:694: kathaṃ na yujyate? āha - tadānīṃ sarveṣāṃ jñānānāmityādi /
SA15bsa061_u:697: tatra vijñaptijñānaṃ na kadāciccittaspandanādhipatyena vinā udbhavatītyataḥ tābhyāṃ te anumīyete /
SA15bsa061_u:698: bhrāntivaśāt kadācid vyavahite 'pyudeti, na tu tadādhipatyarahitatvam /
SA15bsa061_u:703: viśeṣastvasyeṣaḥ - tato 'pio upaplutāvasthāyāṃ vyavahitādhipatyāt paramparayā udayaḥ,
SA15bsa061_u:706_1: vijñaptijñānād uttarakālabhāvijñānāni yathā spandanāyattāni bhavanti tathā pratipādayitumāha
SA15bsa061_u:706_2: - tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanādhipatyādudayaḥ tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi /
SA15bsa061_u:710: tatra paramparā tvevam - jāgradavasthāyāṃ prathamaṃ tāvat paraspandanādhipatyād vijñaptijñāne,
SA15bsa061_u:728: syānmatam - bhavatu paramparayotpādaḥ, vyabhicārastu tadavastha eva / ata evāha -
SA15bsa061_u:729: tatrāpi yādṛganumānaṃ tādṛgavisaṃvādo vyavahāraścāpyastyeveti kenāpi na gṛhyete /
SA15bsa061_u:731: svapnāvasthāyāmapi yādṛk yāvatkālaṃ paracittasya anumānaṃ tādṛk tāvatkālamātraṃ saṃlāpādirūpo 'visaṃvādo 'styeva /
SA15bsa061_u:735: ta evaṃ vyācakṣate - tatra svapnāvasthāyāmapi kāryaliṅgasya kāraṇe 'vyabhicārād yādṛk utpattidharmatayā paramparayā pūrvajñānasyānumānam,
SA15bsa061_u:742: yadi tāvat paracittasya svarūpaṃ sākṣāt jānanti, tadā tasyārthāntaragrahaṇaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa061_u:743: atha na jānanti, kathaṃ te sākṣādvidaḥ?
SA15bsa061_u:746: ye tu sākṣāt paracittavidaḥ teṣāṃ tu katham?
SA15bsa061_u:747: yadi tāvat paracittasya svarūpaṃ sākṣājjānanti, tadāsya pratyakṣasya grāhyamarthāntaraṃ syāt /
SA15bsa061_u:748: atha na jānanti, tadā kathaṃ te yoginaḥ sākṣādvida iti matam // 87 //
SA15bsa061_u:751: atha na gṛhyate, kathaṃ tarhi pramaṇamiti cet?
SA15bsa061_u:754: yadi arthasvarūpaṃ na gṛhyate, kīdṛk tatpratyakṣam?
SA15bsa061_u:755: arthasvarūpāgrahaṇe pramāṇatvaṃ nirākartumāha - atha na gṛhyate kathaṃ tarhi pramāṇamiti /
SA15bsa061_u:762: aprahīṇaḥ grāhyagrāhakavikalpo yeṣāṃ yogināṃ teṣāṃ tathā /
SA15bsa061_u:763: teṣāṃ yat paracittajñānaṃ tad vyavahāre 'visaṃvādādeva pramāṇam, asmadādisambaddharūpādidarśanavat /
SA15bsa061_u:768: yadi paracittajñānaṃ na svarūpasya grāhakam, kathaṃ tarhi tat sphuṭākārakaṃ bhavatīti cet? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:773: yathā karmabalād devādyadhiṣṭhānabalācca satyasvapnadarśināṃ jñānaṃ sphuṭamarthākāramudeti // 90 //
SA15bsa061_u:774: yadyevaṃ cintyeta - bhavatu bhāvanābalādeva yogināṃ paracittajñānam,
SA15bsa061_u:777: te 'pi tadākārasadṛśasvacittapratibhāsameva jānantītyevamavadhāraṇād paracittavida iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:779: tat bhāvanābalājjātamapi paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkartuṃ na samartham /
SA15bsa061_u:781: yadi yoginaḥ paracittasya svarūpaṃ na jānanti, kathaṃ paracittavida ityavadhāryate cet?
SA15bsa061_u:783: yogino 'pi paracittākārasadṛśena svacittapratibhāsenaiva paracittaṃ jānanti [iti paracittavidaḥ] ityevamavadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā vyavahāraḥ pravartate // 91 //
SA15bsa061_u:784: yadi tat svarūpaṃ na gṛhṇāti, kathaṃ tarhi pratyakṣam? kathaṃ ca prāmāṇyamiti cedāha -
SA15bsa061_u:787: yasmāt paracittasyākāraṃ sphuṭamanukaroti, tasmāt pratyakṣamiti matam /
SA15bsa061_u:792: atha na karoti, tadā bhagavataḥ jñānamapyayathārtha syāditi cet? āha -
SA15bsa061_u:793: acintyo hi bhagavataḥ sarvārthādhigamaḥ, sarvathā jñānabhidhānaviṣayātītatvāt /
SA15bsa061_u:795: acintyo hi yogivaryāṇāṃ tathā gatānāṃ buddhagocaraḥ /
SA15bsa061_u:796: teṣāṃ tu na kevalaṃ paracittajñānamacintyam, api tvaviśeṣeṇa sarvārthasarvākārajñānamapi acintyam /
SA15bsa061_u:807: nāpi vitatham, tasya grāhyagrāhakavikalpasadbhāvābhyupagamāt, tasya cāvitathatvena darśanāt /
SA15bsa061_u:813: tadevaṃ bhagavataḥ sarvārthajñānam eteṣu caturṣu yathāyogaṃ yojanīyam // 93 //
